page.title: 16Farming
page.content: We sent a questionare to Philip's parents to find out about their farm. {Buildings and Land. }The Brosters have 10 buildings and quite a lot of land.Altogether they have 24 fields. Some of the fields have names.As far as we know on documentry sources the farmhouse was built in the 16th century{.Animals and Produce.}The Brosters have a lot of animals these animals cover a wide variety here are these animals:_Store_Cattle,Horses,4 Hens and 1 cock,and some rabbits and hares.They have a cat and goldfish. They have no sheep because the land is to wet.They hae no bulls but they have bullocks.They have no milking cows. {Machines.}The Brosters have 26 kinds of machinery.The biggest machine they have is a JCB.....
